sn35.31:4.3: Katamā ca sā, bhikkhave, sabbamaññitasamugghātasappāyā paṭipadā?
sn35.31:4.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuṃ na maññati, cakkhusmiṃ na maññati, cakkhuto na maññati, cakkhuṃ meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.6: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na maññati, cakkhusamphassaṃ na maññati, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.7: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
sn35.31:4.9: jivhaṃ na maññati, jivhāya na maññati, jivhāto na maññati, jivhā meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.11: jivhāviññāṇaṃ na maññati, jivhāsamphassaṃ na maññati.
sn35.31:4.12: Yampidaṃ jivhāsamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.13: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
sn35.31:4.15: manaṃ na maññati, manasmiṃ na maññati, manato na maññati, mano meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.17: manoviññāṇaṃ na maññati, manosamphassaṃ na maññati.
sn35.31:4.18: Yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.19: Yañhi, bhikkhave, maññati, yasmiṃ maññati, yato maññati, yaṃ meti maññati, tato taṃ hoti aññathā.
sn35.31:4.21: Yāvatā, bhikkhave, khandhadhātuāyatanaṃ tampi na maññati, tasmimpi na maññati, tatopi na maññati, taṃ meti na maññati.
sn35.31:4.22: So evaṃ amaññamāno na ca kiñci loke upādiyati.
sn35.31:4.25: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
sn35.31:4.26: Ayaṃ kho sā, bhikkhave, sabbamaññitasamugghātasappāyā paṭipadā”ti.
